## VoteModule.getAll() method

Get All Proposals

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getAll(): Promise<Proposal[]>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Proposal](./sdk.proposal.md)<!-- -->\[\]&gt;

- All the proposals in the contract.

## Remarks

Get all the proposals in this module.

## Example


